name: Ecumenoplis by Dave Krugman, XSULLO, OLLIE CHANIN

metadata.name: Ecumenopolis, Sector 3: Mexico City
metadata.description:
This latest work is the third installation in the Ecumepolis series, a collaboration between @xsullo, @olliechanin, and @dave_krugman. By combining time lapse photography, CGI world building, and a custom musical score, we unveil a world rich with details- an imagining of a city from the not-so-distant future. 

This work extends the universe we began building in February 2021, Ecumonopolis Sector 1: NYC, and Ecumonoplis, Sector 2: Venice Italy
